Class Path

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes.Path
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    This class handles creation of obstacles and moving them.
    Version:
    05.16.2016
    Author:
    Michelle Z. and Waveley Q.
